response.overview: My name is Jules Crocker and I have always loved writing stories. This Super 8 project is my first experience as a camera operator. While the outcome was not what I first imagined-the story I planned didnâ€™t fully develop, and my inexperience with the camera showed-it became an invaluable part of my creative journey. Through the process, I discovered how much there is to learn in both technical skill and storytelling, and I am excited to continue exploring film as a way to grow and share my voice.
response.title: Still The One
